module.name: Mastodon
module.author: Core

property.title: Default Server URL
property.helpText: The default URL for the mastodon instance.

property.title: Cache Period for Images
property.helpText: Please enter the number of hours you would like to cache mastodon images.

property.title: Cache Period
property.helpText: Please enter the number of seconds you would like to cache mastodon search results.

property.title: Hashtag
property.helpText: Test your search by using a Hashtag to return results from the mastodon URL provided in the module settings.

property.title: Server
property.helpText: Leave empty to use the one from settings.

property.title: Username
property.helpText: Provide Mastodon username to get public statuses from the account.

property.title: Count
property.helpText: The number of posts to return (default = 15).

test.message: When duration is per item then number of items must be 1 or higher

property.title: Only posts with attached media?
property.helpText: Return only posts which included attached media.

property.title: Duration is per item
property.helpText: The duration specified is per item otherwise it is per feed.

property.title: Remove Mentions?
property.helpText: Should mentions (@someone) be removed from the Mastodon Post?

property.title: Remove Hashtags?
property.helpText: Should Hashtags (#something) be removed from the Mastodon Post?

property.title: Remove URLs?
property.helpText: Should URLs be removed from the Mastodon Post? Most URLs do not compliment digital signage.
